name: 10th World Congress on Mass Spectrometry & Analytical Techniques
content: MASS SPECTRO 2019 is inviting you to attend as Exhibitor / Sponsor / Collaborator / Media Partner / Speaker / Delegate to expand your network at MASS SPECTRO 2019 on October 24-25, 2019 Prague Czech Republic We are well acquainted and appreciate your excellent work in the field of chromatography and chemistry, believe you might be interested to take part as Speaker/Delegate for our upcoming “10th World Congress on Mass Spectrometry & Analytical Techniques” during October 24-25, 2019 Prague Czech Republic Official Website: MASS SPECTRO 2019 I want to know the availability of your time in your busy schedule, so that I can have an appointment with yourself and make appropriate arrangements. Your prompt response would be appreciated. Olivia Specter Program Director MASS SPECTRO 2019 spectrometrycongress2019@gmail.com
